{"id":1282280810,"question_id":3422,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1717901609,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"284 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1282280810/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the N-th Value After K Seconds","memory":"42.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int MOD = 1000000007;\n    \n    public int valueAfterKSeconds(int n, int k) {        \n        long[] arr = new long[n];\n        long[] prefixSum = new long[n+1];\n\n        for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            arr[i] = 1;\n        }\n\n        for (int second = 0; second < k; second++) {\n            prefixSum[0] = 0;\n            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n                prefixSum[i+1] = (prefixSum[i]+arr[i])%MOD;\n            }\n            for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n                arr[i] = prefixSum[i+1];\n            }\n        }\n\n        return (int)arr[n-1];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-n-th-value-after-k-seconds","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
